title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When trying to use the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter, an error message is thrown. The error message is not specified in the bug report.
OB: An error message is thrown when attempting to use the value new Date('3/2/2005') in a table filter.
EB: The value new Date('3/2/2005') should be accepted as a valid input in the table filter.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and apply a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the 'value1' field of the filter, input new Date('3/2/2005').
